article.headline: Ark.-Pine Bluff 78, MVSU 70
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- Tevin Hammond scored six of his 13 points in overtime via free throws as Arkansas-Pine Bluff downed Mississippi Valley State 78-70 Thursday night in each teams' regular-season finale. The win was the Golden Lions' fourth straight -- Hammond hit a game-winning 3-pointer as UAPB downed Jackson State 73-72 on Feb. 25. The Golden Lions (16-14, 15-3) trailed 65-62 after MVSU's Cortland Henry's free throw with 7 seconds left in regulation, but UAPB's Terrell Kennedy drained a buzzer-beating 3-pointer to force overtime. Kennedy and Davon Haynes had 15 points each to lead UAPB. The teams exchanged the lead 14 times, including seven times in the final 10 minutes of regulation. Davon Usher led the Delta Devils (5-23, 5-13) with 17 points, and Darryl Marshall and Marcus Johnson each added 12. MVSU shot just 31 percent (18 of 58), including 8 of 33 from 3-point range.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
